item.title: Intro
item.description:
Welcome

This is a Jekyll-based documentation site, hosted on GitHub, created for one main purpose:
to record the long, complicated journey of trying to rebuild a life that slipped off track.

Iâ€™m writing all of this not because I want attention, but because I need a place to sort out what happened, who Iâ€™ve become, and who Iâ€™m trying to grow into.

ðŸŒ‘ How Things Fell Apart

A few years ago, during the early part of my teens, things started going wrong in ways I didnâ€™t recognize at the time. I was studying from home, trying to teach myself most subjects, and somehow I kept passingâ€”though looking back, I canâ€™t explain how. Maybe I understood more than I realized, or maybe I relied on shortcuts I donâ€™t fully remember.
